======= BasicBMI Application Welcome to the BMI and BFP Calculator Please fill in the next cases: Here you can calculate your Body Mass Index Here you can calculate your Body Fat Percentage Here you can calculate both Welcome to the Body Mass Index calculator BMI is a measure that uses your height and weight to work out if your weight is healthy >>>>>>> 2a0becd5080332531b69a682eeb156c22c9834cb
